plot: This short film speaks about a child, an unknown territory and an encounter with somebody. Or the fears that a 30 old woman has to face before having a child.
title: 30 de Junio
plot_es: This short film speaks about a child, an unknown territory and an encounter with somebody. Or the fears that a 30 old woman has to face before having a child.
plot_en: This short film speaks about a child, an unknown territory and an encounter with somebody. Or the fears that a 30 old woman has to face before having a child.
